exception mediator.event.aggregate.ConfigEventAggregateError[source]#

Bases: AssertionError, EventAggregateError

Config event aggregate error.

Raised when event aggregate object is not properly configured.

Bases: object

mediator.event.local module#

class mediator.event.local.LocalEventBus[source]#

Bases: EventPublisher, HandlerRegistry, EventSubscriber

Local event bus.

Performs event execution scheduling locally in-place as asyncio backgrount tasks. Connects behaviours of handler registry and event publisher interface.

__init__(policies=None, cascade=None, modifiers=(), sync_mode=False)[source]#

Initializes local event bus with given specification. :param policies: (optional) sequence of policies to be used as recipe to convert raw objects into handlers; if not provided default CallableHandlerPolicy will be used; overwritten when cascade is provided :param cascade: (optional) custom handler factory cascade to customize policy into handler factory mapping :param modifiers: sequence of modifiers to be applied on new handler entries

Parameters

  • policies (Optional[Sequence[Union[CallableHandlerPolicy, MethodHandlerPolicy, MappablePolicy]]]) –

  • cascade (Optional[HandlerFactoryCascade]) –

  • modifiers (Sequence[ModifierFactory]) –

  • sync_mode (bool) –

async publish(obj, **kwargs)[source]#

Publishes given event. :param obj: event object :param kwargs: event extra arguments

Parameters

obj (Any) –

class mediator.event.registry.EventHandlerRegistry[source]#

Bases: HandlerRegistry

Event handler registry class.

Registry that registers (adds) and stores event handlers.

__init__(policies=None, cascade=None, modifiers=())[source]#

Initializes event handler registry. :param policies: (optional) sequence of policies to be used as recipe to convert raw objects into handlers; if not provided default CallableHandlerPolicy is used; overwritten when cascade is provided :param cascade: (optional/advanced) custom handler factory cascade to customize policy into handler factory mapping :param modifiers: sequence of modifiers to be applied on new handler entries

Parameters

class mediator.event.LocalEventBus[source]#

Bases: EventPublisher, HandlerRegistry, EventSubscriber

Local event bus.

Performs event execution scheduling locally in-place as asyncio backgrount tasks. Connects behaviours of handler registry and event publisher interface.
